title: Patch Notes
content: the chapel beneath the Overgrown Ruins. Tweaked the initial shot in Gale's recruitment scene so you can see the player character and the ancient sigil a little better. Fixed Crusher's hands clipping into the ground when he gets down to kiss your feet. Fixed a bug where biting off Crusher's toe and then defeating him in a fist fight would result in a cinematic where the toe was still present.
